name: Ramesses' Return
description:
The great Pharoah Ramesses' tomb has been completely cleaned out. Without his sacred artifacts, he returns from the dead. Go on an adventure to help him get back to bed.  A short game I put together for a class assignment. 

How To Play:

Use the arrows keys or WASD to move and advance dialogue.  Walk into objects or people to interact with them. 

Acknowledgments:

Thanks to @Kubrikante for the cover art.
